title: Ticket #1974: ClassAd::sPrint() should append, not overwrite
description: In the ClassAd compatibility layer, ClassAd::sPrint() overwrites whatever is in the MyString passed to it. In old ClassAds, it appends to the string. This change in behavior is breaking the startd and job router hooks. The old appending behavior should be restored.
